description: Pink City Fabrics Presents An Exclusive Range Of Cotton Bed Sheets Crafted From Premium Cotton Quality That Guarantees A Pleasant Experience. Featuring A Classic Vibrant Rajasthani Design Inspired Printed Bed Sheet With Matching Pillow Covers, A Must Have In Your Collection. Bedsheet Dimension: 215 Cm X 225 Cm ,Pillow Cases Dimension: 45 Cm X 68 Cm.
